text: -gEqva tad-dvAda#SakapAlO vaiSvAnaqrO Ba#vatiq dvAda#Saq mAsA$H saM~MvathsaqraH sa#M~MvathsaqraH Kaluq vA aqgnEryOniqH svAmEqvainaqM ~MyOni#M gamaya-tyAqdya#maqsyAnna#M Bavati vaiSvAnaqraM dvAda#SakapAlaqM nirva#pEnmAruqta(gm) saqptaka#pAlaqM grAma#kAma AhavaqnIyE# vaiSvAnaqramadhi# Srayatiq gAr.ha#patyE mAruqtaM pA#pavasyaqsasyaq vidhRu#tyaiq dvAda#SakapAlO vaiSvAnaqrO Ba#vatiq dvAda#Saq mAsA$H saM~MvathsaqraH sa#M~MvathsaqrENaiqvAsmai# sajAqtA(gg)ScyA#vayati mAruqtO Ba#vati - [  ]  28
